title: The Best 15 AI Forms Tools in 2025
summary: Discover the power of AI Forms, where innovation meets efficiency. This category features cutting-edge tools designed to streamline data collection, automate form creation, and enhance user experience. Whether you need to gather feedback, conduct surveys, or manage registrations, AI Forms simplify the process, saving you time and reducing errors. Explore our curated selection of AI-driven solutions that cater to your unique needs and transform how you interact with your audience. Dive in now to find the perfect tool that elevates your workflow!

tools.name: Jotform
tools.description: Jotform is an online form builder that simplifies data collection, automation, and payment processing for businesses and individuals.

tools.name: forms.app
tools.description: forms.app is a user-friendly online form builder for creating and sharing forms, surveys, and quizzes to collect data effortlessly.

tools.name: Vanta
tools.description: Vanta automates security and compliance processes for businesses, streamlining certifications like SOC 2, ISO 27001, and HIPAA.

tools.name: Mobirise
tools.description: Mobirise is a free, offline website builder for creating responsive, mobile-first websites without coding.

tools.name: BlockSurvey
tools.description: BlockSurvey is a privacy-focused, AI-powered platform for creating secure surveys and forms with end-to-end encryption.

tools.name: EarnBetter
tools.description: EarnBetter is a free AI-powered platform that streamlines job searches by optimizing resumes, matching jobs, and providing tailored application tools.

tools.name: Decktopus
tools.description: Decktopus is an AI-powered presentation builder that enables users to create professional, branded presentations quickly and easily.

tools.name: LazyApply
tools.description: LazyApply automates job applications across platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed to streamline the job search process.

tools.name: Magical
tools.description: Magical is an AI-powered platform that automates repetitive tasks like data entry and messaging to boost productivity.

tools.name: CopilotKit
tools.description: CopilotKit is an agentic framework that enables developers to build AI copilots into applications, offering customizable UI components and support for various LLM and agent frameworks.

tools.name: Zapform
tools.description: Zapform.ai is an AI-powered platform for building intelligent forms, automating data collection, and integrating workflows seamlessly.

tools.name: AutoForm AI
tools.description: AutoForm AI is an AI-powered platform that automates the process of filling out online forms, particularly for job applications, to save users time and effort.

tools.name: Browserfly
tools.description: Browserfly is an AI agent that integrates into your browser to automate tasks, summarize content, and enhance web interactions.

tools.name: ZINQ AI
tools.description: ZINQ AI is a platform for creating engaging, AI-powered forms that facilitate conversational data collection and boost user interaction rates.

tools.name: Tally
tools.description: Tally is a free, intuitive no-code platform for creating and managing online forms, surveys, and quizzes.
